title: The Foundation trilogy : Foundation, Foundation and Empire, Second Foundation
creator: Asimov, Isaac, 1920-1992
description: Foundation: As the Galactic Empire declines, psychohistorian Hari Seldon and his band of psychobiologists form the Foundation, designed to be the nucleus of an eventual ideal universal ruling corporation

Foundation and Empire: The Galactic Empire declines, and a period of disruption ensues, followed by the emergence of the Foundation, creation of psychohistorian Hari Seldon, as a state strong enough to finally defeat the decrepit First Empire
Second Foundation: "This series narrates the fall of a great galactic empire and the efforts of the Foundations to combat the barbarism that follows."
subject: Science fiction
